title: $:/litClock/times/-09:03-Steve Toltz
quote_last: lay in bed, staring at ceiling.

title: $:/litClock/times/-09:03-Jacqueline Wilson
quote_first: This isn’t a very good start to the new school year.“ I stared at her. What was she talking about? Why was she looking at her watch? I wasn’t late. Okay, the school bell had rung as I was crossing the playground, but you always get five minutes to get to your classroom. "It’s
